item.description:
Dzian Gallery presents...
Stephanie Lauder, Photographer
Opening this Friday!

A three day event:

Friday, December 10th
Show Opening
6:00-10:00 PM
Live jazz, hors d'oeuvres, cash bar and free valet parking

Saturday, December 11th
Meet & Greet
1:00-4:00 PM

Sunday, December 12th
Show closes at 4:00 PM
Don't miss the opportunity to experience the extraordinary local talent of photographer, Stephanie Lauder.

Stephanie Lauder is a photographer located in Central Massachusetts where she lives with her children. She has always had a love of the arts, trying her hand at painting, sculpture, jewelry making and crafts. Stephanie got her start in photography with a gift of her first camera over 25 years ago and has been shooting ever since.

www.stephanielauder.com

Dzian Gallery
65 Water St.
Worcester, MA 01604
(508) 831-1106

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Stephanie Lauder, Photographer Opening this Friday!
